item.title: Automated Setup of a Repository Manager
item.description: Previously I was working on a Nexus Repository Manager setup for different environments like a test and a production environment with different privileges, roles, repositories, users etc. The problem with such setups is simple: You usually do it manually which in consequence is error-prone. If you are doing that more than once, it becomes cumbersome and you are asking yourself: Isn’t there a simpler solution to make that setup more reproducible?
